data.name: qryQuery.SelectStatement
data.value:
select [Beist. oder Vorm.] = USR.NameVorname, QT = USR.OrgUnit, PNr = PRS.BaPersonID, Klient = PRS.NameVorname, MB = convert(bit, case when KgMasterbudgetID is not null then 0 else 1 end), Budget = case when BDG.KgMasterbudgetID is not null then dbo.fnXKurzMonat(BDG.Monat) + ' ' + convert(varchar,BDG.Jahr) else 'ab ' + convert(varchar,BDG.BewilligtVon,104) end, BudgetStatus = case when BDG.KgMasterbudgetID is not null then -10-BDG.KgBewilligungCode else -BDG.KgBewilligungCode end, Kategorie = dbo.fnLOVText('KgPositionsKategorie',POS.KgPositionsKategorieCode), Buchungsdatum = convert(varchar,POS.Buchungdatum,104), POS.KontoNr, POS.Buchungstext, POS.Betrag, PosStatus = case when BDG.KgMasterBudgetID is not null then isnull(MAX.KgBuchungStatusCode,1) end, AnzBelege = case when POS.KgPositionsKategorieCode = 1 then (select case when count(*) = 0 then null else count(*) end from KgBuchung where KgPositionID = POS.KgPositionID) end, PosStatusMin = case when BDG.KgMasterBudgetID is not null and MAX.KgBuchungStatusCode <> MIN.KgBuchungStatusCode then MIN.KgBuchungStatusCode end, Auszahlung = ART.ShortText, Termin = dbo.fnLOVText('KgAuszahlungsTermin',POS.KgAuszahlungsTerminCode), Valuta = dbo.fnKgGetValutaTermine(POS.KgPositionID), DebitorKreditor = isNull(KRE.Kreditor,DEB.Name), ErstelltUser = isNull(ERS.LogonName,'Migr.'), ErstelltDatum = POS.ErstelltDatum, MutiertUser = isNull(MUT.LogonName,'Migr.'), MutiertDatum = POS.MutiertDatum, KgPositionID$ = POS.KgPositionID, FallBaPersonID$ = FAL.BaPersonID, JumpToMBPfad$ = case when BDG.KgMasterBudgetID is null then 'CtlKgLeistung' + convert(varchar, LEI.FaLeistungID) + '\Masterbudget' + convert(varchar, BDG.KgBudgetID) else 'CtlKgLeistung' + convert(varchar, LEI.FaLeistungID) + '\Masterbudget' + convert(varchar, BDG.KgMasterBudgetID) + '\Monatsbudget' + convert(varchar, BDG.KgBudgetID) end from KgPosition POS inner join KgBudget BDG on BDG.KgBudgetID = POS.KgBudgetID inner join FaLeistung LEI on LEI.FaLeistungID = BDG.FaLeistungID inner join FaFall FAL on FAL.FaFallID = LEI.FaFallID inner join vwPerson PRS on PRS.BaPersonID = LEI.BaPersonID inner join vwUser USR on USR.UserID = LEI.UserID left join vwKreditor KRE on KRE.BaZahlungswegID = POS.BaZahlungswegID left join BaInstitution DEB on DEB.BaInstitutionID = POS.BaInstitutionID left join XUser ERS on ERS.UserID = POS.ErstelltUserID left join XUser MUT on MUT.UserID = POS.MutiertUserID left join XLOVCode ART on ART.LOVName = 'KgAuszahlungsArt' and ART.Code = POS.KgAuszahlungsArtCode left join KgBuchung MIN on MIN.KgPositionID = POS.KgPositionID and MIN.KgBuchungID = (select top 1 KgBuchungID from KgBuchung B inner join XLOVCode S on S.LOVName = 'KgBuchungsStatus' and S.Code = KgBuchungStatusCode where KgPositionID = POS.KgPositionID order by S.SortKey) left join KgBuchung MAX on MAX.KgPositionID = POS.KgPositionID and MAX.KgBuchungID = (select top 1 KgBuchungID from KgBuchung B inner join XLOVCode S on S.LOVName = 'KgBuchungsStatus' and S.Code = KgBuchungStatusCode where KgPositionID = POS.KgPositionID order by S.SortKey desc)
order by [Beist. oder Vorm.], Klient, MB desc, isNull(BDG.Jahr, year(BDG.BewilligtVon)), isNull(BDG.Monat, month(BDG.BewilligtVon)),POS.KgPositionsKategorieCode, Buchungsdatum
